item.description:
This is a remarkable annual event put together by my dear friend Bret Dubak - all day chanting to bring the vibration of peace into every cell of your being. There are three concerts throughout the day starting at noon - I have introduced Snatam to many of you and she is the last concert at 7pm. Tickets just for the entire day are $108 or just $50 for the evening concert with Snatam. Please ocme show your support and spread the love frequency out to the world....in a time when it is needed most! SNATAM KAUR, DAVID NEWMAN (DURGA DAS) AND EDDY NATARAJ WILL ALL BE CONTRIBUTING TO A DAY OF MUSIC, MANTRAS AND MEDITATIONS.
COME CREATE PEACE WITHIN YOUR SELF AND LET GO EVEN IF IT IS FOR JUST A DAY. WITH SUCH A VARIETY SOUNDS AND HIGH VIBRATIONS THROUGH KIRTAN YOU CAN NOT HELP BUT FEEL THE PEACE WE DEVELOP AS WE SING THE MANY NAMES OF THE ONE TRUE SPIRIT. COME BE ONE OF THE 700 VOICES & RIDE THE WAVES OF BLISS.
item.name: 700 VOICES
